resources.string: Click Sign in below to login with GOOGLE
To Sign Out, Please press "Sign Out" below!
Hi, Welcome to this wonderful app which will help you break bad habits and keep track of new tasks on a Daily/Weekly/Monthly basis.
Would you like to cancel and continue to next Activity?

Activity Name: Home Page\n Overview: This page is the Home Page giving you Instructions on how to use the app and what its about\n Authors: Mohammad Bilal Akhtar, Manav Dharnesh Dessai, Ali Mohamed, Sakir, Arsh
Activity Name: Habit Tracker Page\nOverview: This page is about creating habits that you want to track\n Authors: Mohammad Bilal Akhtar, Manav Dharnesh Dessai, Ali Mohamed, Sakir, Arsh

Activity Name: ToDo Tracker Page\nOverview: This page is about creating a ToDo list for the upcoming days, weeks, months. Just so you know what to do. To delete a task, slide it right. To edit a task, slide it left.\nAuthors: Mohammad Bilal Akhtar, Manav Dharnesh Dessai, Ali Mohamed, Sakir, Arsh

Activity Name: Stats Tracker Page\nOverview: This page gives you an overview of your Habits that are completed and not completed as well as the list of things you have compelted or not\nAuthors: Mohammad Bilal Akhtar, Manav Dharnesh Dessai, Ali Mohamed, Sakir, Arsh
